Na początku nie byłem pewny co do kupna tej gry. Ale gdy już zagrałem, mogę bez przeszkód polecić ten tytuł ;) 

Plusy: 
+ Bardzo dobra gra umysłowa 
+ Ciekawy przebieg wydarzeń [   bez spojlerów tutaj ;)   ]
+ Zabawna :D 
+ Bardzo fajna walka z bossem 
+ Za przejście gry obiecują ciasto <3 
+ Cena ( kupiłem za 1 euro ) 

Minusy:
- Bardzo krótka i to jest chyba tylko jedyny minus

W takim razie czas zabrać się za drugą część ! 
PORTAL 2  - Nadchodze ! :D

Un juego de Puzzles que llega al corazón recomiendo jugar este gran titulo de Valve ahora que son las ofertas y lo encuentras mas barato sin lugar a dudas es uno de los mejor juegos de puzzles que eh llegado a jugar tanto por su historia aparte que tiene Portal y lo graciosa que puede ser GLaDOS al principio y al final de la aventura.

It's an amazing game, it costs 1€ during steam sales and it doesn't require a good PC at all to play. Buy it.

Começo essa analise falando que joguei o Portal 2 antes de ter jogado o Portal 1 :P

Esse jogo é uma obra de arte, gráficos exelentes [b]bonito para um jogo de 2007 e ainda continua sendo bonito[/b] mas isso não importa. O que me atraiu pelo jogo foram os portais e a necessidade de saber o final do jogo.

Recomendo esse jogo, comprem o Portal bundle... Vai ser uma das melhores experiências de sua vida.

E no final vocês ainda vão ouvir essa belíssima músca!

关于传送门的优秀，已经无需再多解释。唯独提一点提升游戏体验的建议，那就是，不要查攻略，不要看视频，不要去了解剧透，不到万不得已，绝不查攻略，好游戏绝对值得入手，一口气几个小时下来，说不定你也会做最后留下莫名的泪水。

Keď sa povie Valve každý iba - CSko, TFko, CSko, TFko, ale toto, to je master piece ....
Napád je genitaln - genialný, umeistňovanie portálov, to je proste parádička, z takej veci ktorá není ani komplikovaná (nemyslím levely, ale nápad) sa dá toto utvoriť ? na rok 2007 je táto hra dokonalá
+nápad
+portaly, umiesťnovanie
+enemáci, nezničíte ich ručne, ale sotením
+musíte premýšlať, táto hra sa dá sice dohrať aj pod hodinou, ale na First Feeling to je aj na 5 hodín
+GLaDOS, perfektozný neutralný charakter

-váša ženština (hlavný charakter) nehovorí

GRAFIKU NEHODNOTIM, TATO HRA NA GRAFIKE NEBOLA ZALOŽENA

这是我第一次在STEAM写评测。献给这款好游戏。
我是87年的，最早接触V社的游戏是半条命系列，玩的最多都是CS。
算是个单机迷吧，只是基本都玩破解版，最近才加入STEAM。
趁着夏促给以前玩过很喜欢的游戏补了票。并买了一些评价较高的游戏，其中就包括这款传送门。
用时3小时通关，名不虚传。因为是直接从大包里买的1+2包，和一堆游戏一起付款，并没有看游戏里的介绍视频（视频有剧透嫌疑，直接从第一关根据提示一边学一边玩比较有趣！）。这款游戏有轻微的晕3D感。18，19关比较难，特别有意思和成就感！BGM很好听，喜欢！
游戏打完有这种感觉的小游戏只记得宝开的植物大战僵尸了。
特此推荐，我活着！期待下次传送门二的体验。。
4小时 通关，非常好的游戏，自己都佩服自己的脑洞hhh
非常经典的游戏，既能动脑又不会太枯燥。14.3个小时全成就通关，也很适合刷成就，难度并不是非常高。

Игра затянула сразу, дошел до 14 уроня, и вот решил настряпать, короткий обзорчик. Подмечу, специфического гида, за кадром, она нам раздает инструкции, но все это смешно выглядит, даже иногда и прикалываетьса. Суть игры в том, что мы пробуем пройти, разные экспериментальные комнаты, нам выдали телепортатор, с помощью которого, включая свои мозги и смекалку, пробуем варианты, как пройти уровень.
Первые уровни - это не сложные комнаты, предназначаны для обучения, нам вроде пушка, то достанетьса на третьем уровне. Но чем дальше, тем всё становитьса сложнее, блокирующие стены, через которые, непроходит портал или направить с помощью портала, выстрельнутую энергию, в нужное русло, да еще так, чтоб и тебя не задело.
Рекомендую всем побаловатся, пока идет летние разпродажи скидка в 90% оно того стоит.

If You have not played this game PLAY THE GAME !!!!!! 

100/69

"When you start a new game, you begin in a small room. There is a friendly robotic voice talking to you, Glados. As the door of your room opens and you walk out. You find out that you're in some sort of test facility, and that you're the test subject. As you puzzle your way through the 18 stages of the facility and are almost done with the 19th one. An unexpected twist happens... "

The main story of this game isnt all that long. But it is very interesting. This was very well done. Especially because there was only one character talking throughout the whole game. While going through the facility, there were a few questions in my head, some answered and some remaining unanswered. 

The puzzling in this game requires the player to remember all of the previously used gameplay mechanics, and combine them while thinking outside of the box. Doesn't get boring for a second. It can get very frustrating though. Not being able to complete certain puzzles. But you always gotta keep it cool and play around for a bit. This is the way i found the solutions to some puzzles I didnt understand. 

Every stage also has a few developer notes * if turned on * which tell you a lot of interesting things about how the developers chose to do certain things. Made the game even more interesting.

Plus points
- Very fun puzzles, wont get boring for a second. Especially if you enjoy puzzling.
- Interesting Character ( Glados )
- Has a Challenge mode 
- This big small world is designed well
- Interesting "combat" system

Minus points
- Short story
- Sometimes the puzzles are just too easy and sometimes way too hard
- Barely explains the stuff that you want to know ( Can also be my fault or be explained in P2 )\

Hereby I give this game a 8/10 
And for this price ( especially during summer sale ) I don't see a reason not to get it.
Along with most of the games that can be purchased in the Valve Complete Pack this is a must have for anyone that considers PC gaming for their entertainment.
